abstract: Ford Motor has hired Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley and HSBC to sell Jaguar and Land Rover, its two British luxury brands, The Financial Times reported Monday. The planned sale does not include Volvo, Ford’s third premium brand, and is said to be in its early stages, the paper said.
lead_paragraph: Ford Motor has hired Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley and HSBC to sell Jaguar and Land Rover, its two British luxury brands, The Financial Times reported Monday. The planned sale does not include Volvo, Ford’s third premium brand, and is said to be in its early stages, the paper said.

headline.main: Ford Is Said to Hire Banks to Run Sale of Luxury Brands
